name: your_api
description: This is where you are expected to write the application. You are free to choose the technology and framework. At Djamo, our typical stack is written in [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), using [NestJS](https://docs.nestjs.com/) and relying on [Postgres](https://www.postgresql.org/) for persistent storage and [Redis](https://redis.io/) for cache.
